values.description: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a big dog. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit; speaking is difficult outside of barks and whines, but eating is easier.
A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a big dog. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit, making eating easier. Adaptation has removed some of the difficulty with speaking.
